title: Justice for Bonnie
description: In this Dateline classic, Keith Morrison reports from Alaska on a mother’s emotional crusade to find her daughter’s killer. Originally aired on NBC on January 13, 2012.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
